definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
first month of a season/eldest amongst brothers

sentences.english: The article discusses the elimination of phenol with sodium permanganate oxidation in water.
sentences.chinese: 研究了高錳酸鈉對水中苯酚的去除作用。

sentences.english: So that a new way to produce high-purity manganese carbonate is opened up.
sentences.chinese: 從而爲高純度碳酸錳的製備開闢了一條新的途徑。

sentences.english: The main characteristics of the rail steel are low manganese and high carbon which content is being closed to eutectoid.
sentences.chinese: 其成分特徵是碳含量在共析點左右的高碳低錳鋼軌鋼。

sentences.english: Objective To study the changes of sperm quality in mice treated with manganous chloride.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究用氯化錳處理的小鼠精子質量的變化。

sentences.english: The Environmental Protection Agency does not regulate manganese under the Safe Drinking Water Act.
sentences.chinese: 環境保護機構沒有按照安全飲用水法案規範錳的含量。

sentences.english: The development direction and aim of mercury-free separator paper for battery were summarized.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了無汞鹼錳電池隔離紙的發展方向和目標。

sentences.english: The main pollutant in Dumu reservoir is manganese by environmental monitoring results.
sentences.chinese: 監測顯示，獨木水庫中的主要污染物爲錳。

sentences.english: Bars and rods, for welding electrodes, hot-rolled, in irregularly wound coils, of silicomanganese steel.
sentences.chinese: 熱軋硅錳鋼條及杆，焊接電極用，繞成不規則卷盤狀。

sentences.english: It was therefore the reason that caused the iron and manganese pollution in groundwater of landfill site.
sentences.chinese: 從而造成垃圾場地下水較嚴重的鐵錳污染。

sentences.english: The pilot-scale test results of producing Boric acid and manganese carbonate from B-Mn ore are elucidated.
sentences.chinese: 闡述了由硼錳礦生產硼酸和碳酸錳的半工業試驗結果。

sentences.english: It introduces a few methods of silicomanganese with high-silicon in production practice.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了生產高硅錳硅合金的幾種方法。

sentences.english: The neurotoxic effects of manganese exposure in the workplace are well known.
sentences.chinese: 衆所周知，工作場所的錳有神經毒素的效果。

sentences.english: This paper described briefly the stoping work of remnant orebody in accumulative manganese deposits.
sentences.chinese: 本文簡介了堆積型錳礦牀殘礦體的回採工作。

sentences.english: Manganese is a hard, brittle, gray-white metal.
sentences.chinese: 錳是一種灰白色的，又硬又脆的金屬。

sentences.english: Soil of Fe-Mn nodules background in Litang karst was analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 對黎塘岩溶區鐵錳結核背景下的土壤進行了分析。

sentences.english: Then, the characteristics of manganese nodules and biogenic deposition of manganese are analyzed and summarized in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 同時，分析和總結了錳結核和錳的生物沉積特徵。

definition: operculum (Latin: little lid)/a covering flap (in various branches of anatomy)
